amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Foreign Agricultural Service account by $175 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Foreign Agricultural Service account by $175 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 324 (Roll no. 432).
